abstract: French judge rules that Liliane Bettencourt, aging heiress of L'Oreal cosmetics fortune, be placed under care of legal guardian after medical evaluation indicates that she suffers from dementia and Alzheimer's disease.
snippet: The judge in the case of Liliane Bettencourt based her decision on a medical evaluation that indicated the heiress suffers from dementia and Alzheimer's disease.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the case of Liliane Bettencourt based her decision on a medical evaluation that indicated the heiress suffers from dementia and Alzheimer's disease.

headline.main: French Court Puts L'Oréal Heiress Under Guardianship
headline.print_headline: France: Heiress Loses Control of Fortune
